values.recommendationText: I had the privilege to work alongside Sanyam on a handful of projects during our time together at Fueled, and as a mobile engineer I can say that Sanyam made my interaction with backend APIs resoundingly easier. On top of all this he exudes both self-assuredness and humbleness, thoughtfully and calmly allaying concerns of clients or stakeholders. It was a pleasure being on the same team as Sanyam, and I can whole-heartedly recommend him as a talented and brilliant engineer, as well as a fantastic colleague.
